name: Cards of a Journey
description:
Desktop version early access 
Be part of adding the finishing touches to the desktop release of Cards!

A big adventure in a small deck of cards

“Cards of a Journey” is a puzzle cardventure. Fate may have dealt you the cards but you decide which ones to play. Your wits and your love for experiments and exploring will guide you through the perils of the world. And a cat. Don't forget the cat…

Features

  • a wild ride through lush forests, deadly deserts and howling caves
  • epic wins and ridiculous failures
  • innovative card puzzle mechanics
  • super fast to learn and easy to get lost in
  • controller support
  • language independent (but if you made it this far that shouldn't matter)

Although the game is fully playable from start to end there are some known missing features in early access version 1:

  • Some menu translations are missing
  • Missing keyboard/controller support for menu
  • Not all scenes have backgrounds
